xplane_ops.py

Defines Operators

Summary
xplane_ops.pyDefines Operators
Functions
findFCurveByPathHelper function to find an FCurve by an data-path.
makeKeyframesLinearSets interpolation mode of keyframes to linear.
getDatarefValuePathReturns the data path for a XPlaneDataref value.
getPoseBoneReturns the corresponding PoseBone of a BlenderBone.
getPoseBoneIndexReturns the index of a PoseBone
SCENE_OT_add_xplane_layersInitially creates xplane relevant data for XPlaneLayers in the current Blender scene.
SCENE_OT_add_xplane_layer_attributeAdds a custom attribute to a XPlaneLayer.
SCENE_OT_remove_xplane_layer_attributeRemoves a custom attribute from a XPlaneLayer.
OBJECT_OT_add_xplane_object_attributeAdds a custom attribute to a Blender Object.
OBJECT_OT_remove_xplane_object_attributeRemoves a custom attribute from a Blender Object.
OBJECT_OT_add_xplane_object_anim_attributeAdds a custom animation attribute to a Blender Object.
OBJECT_OT_remove_xplane_object_anim_attributeRemoves a custom animation attribute from a Blender Object.
OBJECT_OT_add_xplane_material_attributeAdds a custom attribute to a Blender Material.
OBJECT_OT_remove_xplane_object_attributeRemoves a custom attribute from a Blender Material.
OBJECT_OT_add_xplane_lamp_attributeAdds a custom attribute to a Blender Lamp.
OBJECT_OT_remove_xplane_object_attributeRemoves a custom attribute from a Blender Lamp.
OBJECT_OT_add_xplane_datarefAdds a XPlaneDataref to a Blender Object.
OBJECT_OT_remove_xplane_datarefRemoves a XPlaneDataref from a Blender Object.
OBJECT_OT_add_xplane_dataref_keyframeAdds a Keyframe to the value of a XPlaneDataref of an object.
OBJECT_OT_remove_xplane_dataref_keyframeRemoves a Keyframe from the value of a XPlaneDataref of an object.
BONE_OT_add_xplane_datarefAdds a XPlaneDataref to a Blender bone.
BONE_OT_remove_xplane_datarefRemoves a XPlaneDataref from a Blender bone.
BONE_OT_add_xplane_dataref_keyframeAdds a Keyframe to the value of a XPlaneDataref of a bone.
BONE_OT_remove_xplane_dataref_keyframeRemoves a Keyframe from the value of a XPlaneDataref of a bone.
Functions
addXPlaneOpsRegisters all Operators.
removeXPlaneOpsUnregisters all Operators.

Functions

findFCurveByPath

def findFCurveByPath(fcurves,
path)

Helper function to find an FCurve by an data-path.

Parameters

listFCurves
stringdata path.

Returns

FCurve or None if no FCurve could be found.

makeKeyframesLinear

def makeKeyframesLinear(obj,
path)

Sets interpolation mode of keyframes to linear.

Parameters

objBlender object
string pathdata path.

Todos

  • not working

def getDatarefValuePath(index,  
bone =  None)

Parameters

int indexIndex of the XPlaneDataref

Returns

getPoseBone

def getPoseBone(armature,
name)

Returns the corresponding PoseBone of a BlenderBone.

Parameters

armatureBlender armature the bone is part of.
string nameName of the Bone.

Returns

PoseBoneA Blender PoseBone or None if it could not be found.

getPoseBoneIndex

def getPoseBoneIndex(armature,
name)

Returns the index of a PoseBone

Parameters

armatureBlender armature the bone is part of.
string nameName of the Bone.

Returns

intIndex of the PoseBone or -1 if it could not be found.
